backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a dental appointment booking system with role-based access control (admin/user), appointment CRUD operations, user profiles, blob storage mixin, and 11 service types including exams, cleanings, extractions, Invisalign, and Botox consultations.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend components including routing, layout, pages, forms, hooks, and styling with detailed descriptions of animations, error handling, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, "Annaya Dental Care" title, and root div mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, booking, services list/detail, and admin pages, wrapped in QueryClientProvider and including Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminLoginForm.t: Admin login form component with username/password validation using react-hook-form, error alerts, loading states, and integration with useAdminAuth hook for credential verification.
Appointment booking form with date picker, service selection dropdown mapping 16 user-friendly service names to backend ServiceType enum, retry logic with attempt tracking, comprehensive error handling for actor initialization/network issues, and success animations.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Displays contact information (location, phone, email, hours) in a card layout with icons and includes a WhatsApp button. Uses scroll animations and integrates with Google Maps embed.
frontend/src/components/DoctorsSection.t: Renders a grid of doctor profile cards with avatars, names, and specializations for three dental professionals. Each card has hover effects and staggered scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with three columns displaying clinic branding, contact details, and quick links. Includes copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with navigation menu supporting both route links and smooth scroll anchors, mobile hamburger menu, and conditional admin logout button. Tracks active section on scroll.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with dual-card layout featuring a reception area image with CTA buttons and a promotional banner with gradient background. Includes booking and contact actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with Header and Footer, using Outlet for nested route rendering in a flex column structure.
Displays six dental service cards in a grid with icons, images, descriptions, and action buttons. Each card has hover effects and scroll animations with staggered delays.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays patient testimonials in an auto-rotating carousel with star ratings, Google rating badge, and a before/after treatment results showcase image. Includes hover-to-pause functionality for the carousel.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Renders a 'Why Choose Us' section with four feature cards (Expert Doctors, Modern Technology, Emergency Care, Affordable Pricing) and a photo gallery showcasing clinic facilities. Uses scroll animations for staggered entrance effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating anonymous or authenticated actors based on Internet Identity login state. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides admin authentication functionality using sessionStorage with hardcoded credentials (ANAS/Anas@2020). Exposes login, logout, and authentication check methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Handles identity loading, login flow, and session management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating appointment and user profile data from the backend actor. Includes retry logic with exponential backoff for handling transient errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when elements enter the viewport, enabling scroll-triggered animations. Respects user's reduced motion preferences and supports configurable thresholds.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and includes keyframe animations for various UI transitions (fade-in, slide-up, pulse, etc.).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all appointments in a filterable/sortable table, handles admin authentication, and includes profile setup for first-time users. Features search by name, service type filtering, date range filtering, and appointment sorting.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Simple booking page that displays the AppointmentForm component with a back button to home and introductory text about scheduling appointments.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that composes multiple sections: HeroSection, ServicesSection, WhyChooseUsSection, DoctorsSection, TestimonialsSection, and ContactSection.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Detailed service information page that displays comprehensive descriptions, procedures, benefits, duration, and special features for each dental service using data from a local servicesData object. Includes navigation to booking page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services overview page that displays a grid of dental service cards with icons, descriptions, images, and durations. Each card links to its detailed service page and includes scroll animations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables, Inter font family, custom border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for Annaya Dental Care website showing pending admin panel features including authentication (username 'ANAS', password 'Anas@2020'), clinic schedule management, and service editing capabilities.
